config.name: active
config.doc: if active is false the system will be skipped during processing

config.name: gravity
config.doc: the local gravity of the world

config.name: scale
config.doc: the scale that is applied to input before it is passed to the physics engine

config.name: showConstraints
config.doc: Flag determining whether constraints will be drawn in calls to drawWorld(..)

config.name: showContacts
config.doc: Flag determining whether contact points will be drawn in calls to drawWorld(..)

config.name: showContactImpulses
config.doc: Flag determining whether contact impulses will be drawn in calls to drawWorld(..). For impulses to be drawn, it must also be the case that showContacts is true.

config.name: showRigidBodies
config.doc: Flag determining whether rigid bodies will be drawn in calls to drawWorld(..)

config.name: showColliderShapes
config.doc: Flag determining whether collidable shapes will be drawn in calls to drawWorld(..) and drawRigidBody(..)

config.name: showSensorShapes
config.doc: Flag determining whether shapes with sensor true will be drawn in calls to drawWorld(..) and drawRigidBody(..)

config.name: showBodyDetail
config.doc: Flag determining whether rigid body details (origin, and change in position since last update) will be drawn in calls to drawWorld(..), and drawRigidBody(..)

config.name: showShapeDetail
config.doc: Flag determining whether shape details (world-space bounds) will be drawn in calls to drawWorld(..), and drawRigidBody(..)
